channel.title: How do i change the name of my server and its ip?
channel.description: plz help m im clueless here (not that smart w/ this stuff :D i hav the server and i can log onto it but the ip is 0.0.0.0 and idk the name so will som1 help change this???

item.title: How do i change the name of my server and its ip?
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

Try logging in at 127.0.0.1 it says 0.0.0.0 but that is because the server starts on your computer, so you dont have to connect to it.
Btw, 127.0.0.1 is your “local ip” when making your own server, always connect to that one.

Hope this helps,
Delicious

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the name of my server and its ip?

item.source: How do i change the name of my server and its ip?

item.title: How do i change the name of my server and its ip?
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

[quote=“Vince`, post:7, topic:45798”]TCP - Transmission Control Protocol Used for Communication over Internet

UDP - User Datagram Protocol Doesn’t connect to direct internet as TCP Does

[glow=red,2,300]Vince`[/glow][/quote]

Oh, well then I must be thinking of internet & external IPs. The computer has its own IP which indicates where on the network its connected to, and the network has an IP for that computer which has to do where the computer is located with respect to the network.

And the Datagram protocal doesn’t “not connect to the internet like TCP” it simply sends its packets without having any clue where they’re going, and trusts the network to deliver the packets based on the content of the aforementioned packets.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i change the name of my server and its ip?

[quote=“Vince`, post:5, topic:45798”]Windows -> Run -> Cmd -> Ipconfig/release -> Ipconfig/renew

Since His IP is at 0.0.0.0

[glow=red,2,300]Vince`[/glow][/quote]

Apparently someone doesn’t know the difference between UDP and TCP

item.title: How do i change the name of my server and its ip?
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

[quote=“Vince`, post:3, topic:45798”]Umm, You want to change your Source’s Name? Or your Computer’s IP?

[glow=red,2,300]Vince`[/glow][/quote]

Since you’re IP is decided by the internet software, you can do neither. Case closed.

Read full topic
